    Projects

    VR Space

    A work-in-progress proof-of-concept for a novel locomotion system for VR. It uses the physical space (previously mapped) around the user to generate the map. Joystick movement or teleporting are not used.

    Tech Stack: C# · Unity · XR famework

    Cultural Heritage Jam

    A 2D platformer runner where you could play as an art restorer who run and perform restoration action on the wonderful art pieces from legacies of Mexico, China and Portugal. Let's bring damaged masterpieces back to their former glory.

    Tech Stack: C# · Unity · FMOD

    Game Engine Project

    A humble self-taught project exploring the intricacies of game engine architecture and functionality. Utilizing C++, Vulkan and CMAKE, delve into the world of game development, gaining valuable insights and honing your skills in this fascinating domain.

    Tech Stack: C++ · CMAKE · VULKAN · SDL

    Book Recommender

    A book recommender, which leverages the capabilities of a fine-tuned GPT-2 language model and Vision Transformer. Drawing insights from a diverse dataset of small-sized book covers and descriptions across thirty-three genres, we aim to provide unbiased and personalized recommendations.

    Tech Stack: Python · Numpy · Pandas · Pytorch · Tensorflow · HTML · CSS · Javascript

    Pedestrian Detection Classification

    A humble demo project focused on pedestrian image analysis. Through the extraction of Haar features and experimentation with pattern recognition models, delve into classification tasks. Gain insights into the capabilities of different models in recognizing pedestrians based on their distinct visual patterns.

    Tech Stack: Python · Numpy · Pandas · Pytorch · Tensorflow · Scikit-learn

    Intrusion Detection Classification

    A academic demo project showcasing the application of feature selection methods on the KDD99 intrusion dataset. Through the utilization of Random Forest and Support Vector Machine algorithms, gain insights into effective feature selection techniques for improving intrusion detection performance.

    Tech Stack: Python · Numpy · Pandas · Scikit-learn · kdd-99-dataset

    Cuda Extreme Learning Machine

    A academic demo project focused on enhancing the performance of image features extracted from the CIFAR-10 dataset. By implementing an Extreme Learning Machine using CUDA C, explore the potential for accelerated computation and improved results in image classification tasks.

    Tech Stack: Cuda C · Python · Numpy · Pandas · Scikit-learn · Tensorflow · Cifar-10

    Portfolio Website

    Welcome to my portfolio website, crafted from a Resume template by Start Bootstrap. With the aid of advanced bootstrap snippets and third-party animation plugins, this site is for yours truly, showcasing my work in a captivating and engaging manner.

    Tech Stack: PUG · SCSS · NPM · HTML · CSS · Javascript · Bootstrap · Typed · AOS

    WebGIS Rental Discovery

    A full-stack demo project designed to assist you humbly in finding and comparing local rentals. Leveraging WebGIS technology, maven, Flask, and the native framework LayUI, explore a user-friendly web application that simplifies the rental search process, making it effortless and efficient.

    Tech Stack: Java · Python · Redis · Maven · Web GIS · LayUI · HTML · CSS · Javascript · JSON

    Women in Games Ambassador

    Women in Games
    • To support all women, those identifying as women, non-binary individuals and allies, no matter what stage they are in their career or life journey;
    • To empower people to challenge gender inequality and discrimination by providing a safe space to socially connect, and to exchange knowledge and perspectives to activate change;
